original_title: Film annonce du film qui n’existera jamais: “Drôles de guerres”
overview: Rejecting the billions of alphabetic diktats to liberate the incessant metamorphoses and metaphors of a necessary and true language by returning to the locations of past film shoots, while keeping track of modern times.
tagline: There is only one really serious philosophical problem, and that is suicide
title: Trailer of the Film That Will Never Exist: “Phony Wars”
